title: Ragdoll Soccer 2 Players
description: Ragdoll Soccer: 2 Players is a sports soccer game that delivers the ultimate blend of soccer and chaos, where wobbly ragdoll physics takes over the field for hilarious and unpredictable gameplay! Step into the shoes (or, more accurately, the floppy limbs) of a stickman player and take on the challenge solo or face off against a friend in intense local multiplayer. With a variety of modes like Championship, Penalty Shootout, and single-player, there's never a dull moment.
